entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
